parse.title: Letter to a Primary School in Acocks Green

links.*: Letters not published in "The Letters of J.R.R. Tolkien"
Sotheby's English Literature, History, Children's Books, and Illustrations 16 December 2004
The J.R.R. Tolkien Companion and Guide

wikitext.*:
On [[17 October]] [[1966]], [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] wrote '''[[Letters not published in "The Letters of J.R.R. Tolkien"|a letter]] to a primary school class in Acocks Green'''.<ref>{{CG|C}}, p. 677</ref>

*'''Subjects:''' ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]'', personal relation to [[Acocks Green]].
*'''Description:'''  1 page, [[76 Sandfield Road]], [[Oxford]]. Typed letter with postscript in blue ink.
*'''Publication:''' Excerpts from the letter have appeared in ''[[Sotheby's English Literature, History, Children's Books, and Illustrations 16 December 2004]]''. 
{{references}}
